text: ohugen pasu pæmiṇi janatāvaṭada api dūtayin kihipa deneku yævvemu. ovunda pæhædili sādhakayanma ovun veta gena āvāha. ehet movunṭa pera (movungē mutun mittan) boru karamin siṭi dæya (enam satyayan gæna) movunda, viśvāsavantayin vaśayen siṭiyē næta. sīmāva ikmavana mevænnangē hṛdayan kerehi (ovungē pāpayanhi hētuven) mē andamaṭama api mudrā kara harinnemu
